article_title: Watch President Obama's 2016 State of the Union Address Here
article_text: Watch Live: President Obama’s 2016 State of the Union Address to the nation. Tonight at 9pm, The Fiscal Times will livestream President Obama’s speech, followed by South Carolina Governor Nikki Haley’s Republican response. You’ll also see a live twitter stream, below, from our political staff as well as our partners. So sit back wherever you are—on your phone, laptop or tablet—and enjoy.

article_summary:
Watch Live: President Obama’s 2016 State of the Union Address to the nation.
Tonight at 9pm, The Fiscal Times will livestream President Obama’s speech, followed by South Carolina Governor Nikki Haley’s Republican response.
You’ll also see a live twitter stream, below, from our political staff as well as our partners.
So sit back wherever you are—on your phone, laptop or tablet—and enjoy.
